description: The Gaston Gazette app is a must-have for those living, working and keeping in touch with Gaston County and the surrounding area. It’s the official companion to The Gazette, the hometown newspaper for the Gaston County area. Get the latest news around the clock from our award-winning staff. Access local news stories, plus sports, entertainment, videos, photographs and much more. The app’s simple design helps you find content quickly and easily. Customize your news and favorites with “My News.” Save stories for reading when convenient. Share our content through e-mail, Facebook and Twitter. If you like our app, spread the word to your friends on Facebook and Twitter.  The Gaston Gazette app is an ad-supported application.
